name: Jack Lemmon Movies Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: In my opinion, 'Days of Wine and Roses' was Lemmon's best film. Who was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
Lee Remick.

	With Jack Klugman and Charles Bickford. Top film.

questions.text: Which of these comedies was NOT based on a work by Neil Simon?
questions.explanation:
Some Like It Hot.

	All are Lemmon movies.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Jack Lemmon comedy?
questions.explanation:
Plaza Suite.

	'Plaza' is a Matthau piece.

questions.text: Lemmon starred in 'My Fellow Americans'. Who was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
James Garner.

	Not great - but, a smile.

questions.text: Lemmon had a role in 'Glengarry Glen Ross'. Who wrote the play?
Lemmon had a great early success in 'Mister Roberts'. He played a member of what branch of the service?
Lemmon also starred in 'Irma La Douce' and 'The Apartment'. Who was his co-star in both movies?'
Which of the following had Jack Lemmon in a key role?
questions.explanation:
China Syndrome.

	With Jane Fonda and Michael Douglas. Good movie.

questions.text: Jack won an Oscar for which movie?
questions.explanation:
Save the Tiger.

	Nothing special as a movie.

questions.text: Lemmon teamed with frequent co-star Walter Matthau in which movie?
questions.explanation:
The Fortune Cookie.

	Matthau got the Oscar.
